data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Gangwon.
Seoul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Gangwon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Seoul capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gangwon's half?
Throw-in Gangwon.
In the minute 10, Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Throw-in for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
Kim Woo-sung signals a throw-in for Gangwon, close to Seoul's area.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seoul.
Gangwon needs to be cautious. Seoul have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Free kick Gangwon.
Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung signals a Gangwon throw-in in Seoul's half.
In the minute 18, Kim Ji-hyeon for Gangwon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Kim Woo-sung awards Seoul a goal kick.
Gangwon have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Seoul in the half of Gangwon.
Kim Woo-sung awards the home team a throw-in.
Gangwon's Cho Jae-wan gets in a shot on goal at World Cup Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 24, Seoul have a dangerous throw-in.
Seoul attack but Jo Yeong-uk's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Gangwon at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 27, Seoul have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Throw-in for Seoul close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
In the minute 29, Kim Won-sik (Seoul) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
Goal kick for Gangwon at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 33, Can Seoul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gangwon's half?
Seoul to take a throw-in in Gangwon territory.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Gangwon.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Seoul.
Seoul drive forward but Jung Han-min is judged offside.
Goal! Jung Han-min gives Seoul a 1-0 lead in Seoul.
In the minute 39, That's a fine assist from Yun Ju-tae.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Gangwon territory.
Gangwon's Cho Jae-wan misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 44, Kim Woo-sung awards Seoul a goal kick.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Seoul's Han Seung-gyu is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Seoul.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Seoul.
Seoul pushes forward through Yun Ju-tae, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at World Cup Stadium.
Kim Woo-sung has blown to start the second-half.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gangwon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, Lee Yeong-jae is replacing Cho Ji-hun for Gangwon at World Cup Stadium.
Gangwon's Lee Yeong-jae breaks free at World Cup Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 48, Seoul have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 51, Gangwon will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Seoul.
In Seoul Seoul attack through Kim Won-sik. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
In the minute 55, Kim Won-sik of Seoul smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 58, Kim Woo-sung signals a Seoul throw-in in Gangwon's half.
The home team replace Yun Ju-tae with Kim Jin-ya.
In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Im Chai-min (Gangwon) has received a yellow card from Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Goal! Han Seung-gyu extends Seoul's lead to 2-0.
Kim Jin-ya instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Seoul in the half of Gangwon.
Seoul's Jo Yeong-uk breaks free at World Cup Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 64, Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
In Seoul, Seoul push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Byung-Soo Kim is making the team's second substitution at World Cup Stadium with Kim Seung-dae replacing Ko Mu-yeol.
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
Seoul’s Yang Han-been is on his feet again at World Cup Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Attention is being given to Seoul’s Yang Han-been and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 68, Gangwon drive upfield and Lee Yeong-jae gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Seoul defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Gangwon in Seoul.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 71, Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Can Gangwon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seoul's half?
In Seoul Gangwon drive forward through Lee Yeong-jae. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 74, Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Gangwon in Seoul.
Kim Ho-young (Seoul) is making a second substitution, with Park Chu-young replacing Jo Yeong-uk.
In the minute 76, At World Cup Stadium, Gangwon are penalized for being offside.
Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Seoul.
In the minute 77, Kim Woo-sung signals a throw-in for Seoul, close to Gangwon's area.
Throw-in Gangwon.
At World Cup Stadium, Hwang Hyun-soo has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 80, Seoul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Kim Woo-sung awards Seoul a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Gangwon.
Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Gangwon.
Seoul make their third substitution with Cha Oh-yeon replacing Jung Han-min.
Gangwon drives forward and Kim Seung-dae gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 87, Free kick Seoul.
Jung Suk-hwa for Gangwon has been booked by Kim Woo-sung and receives a first yellow card.
Gangwon surge into the attack at World Cup Stadium but Kim Ji-hyeon’s header is off-target.
In the minute 89, Seoul have a goal kick.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Kim Ji-hyeon for Gangwon drives towards goal at World Cup Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Gangwon at World Cup Stadium.
Free kick for Gangwon in the half of Seoul.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung awards the away team a throw-in.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
Kim Won-sik (Seoul) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Seoul extend their lead to 3-0 through Park Chu-young.
